title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - When selecting 'xxx' as destination in 'copy package' operation in jdt.ui3, it behaves strangely.
OB: The 'copy package' operation in jdt.ui3 behaves strangely when 'xxx' is selected as the destination.
EB: The 'copy package' operation in jdt.ui3 should behave correctly when 'xxx' is selected as the destination. The expected behavior is that it should copy the package to the destination without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the jdt.ui3 project 
2. Go to the 'Package Explorer' view 
3. Right-click on a package that needs to be copied 
4. Select 'Copy Package' 
5. Choose 'xxx' as the destination 
6. Observe the strange behavior during the copy operation.
